statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE restock_threshold > 20 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock >= 5 AND current_stock <= 15;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name DESC, current_stock ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE restock_threshold < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock AS stock_count FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > 20 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 10 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT id, product_name FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT id, alert_message FROM RestockAlert WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-05-01';
SELECT product_name, restock_threshold FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < restock_threshold;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT id, product_name FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 100 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock, restock_threshold FROM Inventory WHERE restock_threshold < 50;
SELECT I.product_name, R.alert_message FROM Inventory I JOIN RestockAlert R ON I.id = R.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM restock_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < restock_threshold ORDER BY product_name ASC, stock_level DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT product_name, stock_level, restock_threshold FROM inventory INNER JOIN restock_alerts ON inventory.product_id = restock_alerts.product_id WHERE stock_level < restock_threshold
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' OR product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY product_name
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT alert_id, item_id, alert_timestamp FROM restock_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT item_id, restock_quantity, restock_date, restock_time FROM restock_history WHERE restock_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, restock_threshold FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT users.username, restock_history.restock_quantity, restock_history.restock_date FROM users JOIN restock_history ON users.user_id = restock_history.item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity, restock_threshold FROM inventory_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%' OR item_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT users.email, restock_alerts.alert_timestamp, restock_alerts.alert_message FROM users JOIN restock_alerts ON users.user_id = restock_alerts.item_id ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC, stock_level ASC
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level > 50
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id = 3
SELECT * FROM restock_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT u.username, n.notification_type, n.notification_text FROM users u JOIN notifications n ON u.user_id = n.user_id
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level < restock_threshold;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT item_name, restock_amount, restock_datetime FROM inventory_items INNER JOIN restock_history ON inventory_items.item_id = restock_history.item_id ORDER BY restock_datetime DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_text, notification_datetime FROM notifications WHERE notification_datetime > '2022-01-01' AND notification_type = 'Alert';
